mapper.sql: id, name, company, phone, address, remark, uid, staffname, belongs, lately_account, group_id, status, initial, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from customer
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT
FROM customer WHERE `status` = 1 AND id = #{cid} AND belongs = #{belongs} limit 1

SELECT
FROM customer WHERE `status` = 1 AND id = #{cid} AND uid = #{uid} limit 1
